thread.title: Cozy hotel in a great area
thread.title_full: Cozy hotel in a great area - Review of Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Anastasia P
title: Cozy hotel in a great area
text: I'm really impressed with Hotel Xenia! Our room was small but cozy, with all needed amenities. Nice quality bed sheets, towels and bath robes. The hotel has a great bar, and the drinks are very tasty. Nice continental breakfast for Â£16/person. The best thing is the area, which has many stores and restaurants. Hyde park and several museums are only a few bus stops away. I would definitely stay again!
